column4: Could anyone tell me why my SB Live sound card wount work in ubuntu? It worked in xubuntu... I have one 3,5mm jack in the card and two composite(red and white) in my amplifier in one cable.
both xubuntu and ubuntu use the same sound drivers
then its my brand new computer ubuntu doesnt like? Cause its the same card(picked it out of the xubuntu machine)
could be a motherboard issue I suppose
